md:
giải nghĩa từ "decayed" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Decay (verb): bị hư hỏng, bị phân hủy
	+ Example: The food decayed quickly because it was not stored properly.
	+ Related words: decompose, rot, spoil, deteriorate

* Decay (noun): sự hư hỏng, sự phân hủy
	+ Example: The decay of the tooth was caused by poor oral hygiene.
	+ Related words: decomposition, rot, spoilage, deterioration

* Radioactive decay (noun): sự phân hủy phóng xạ
	+ Example: The radioactive decay of the material was a major concern for the scientists.
	+ Related words: nuclear decay, radioactive disintegration, radiation decay

* Tooth decay (noun): sự hư hỏng răng
	+ Example: The dentist warned her about the dangers of tooth decay if she didn't brush her teeth regularly.
	+ Related words: cavities, dental caries, tooth rot

* Urban decay (noun): sự hư hỏng đô thị
	+ Example: The city's urban decay was evident in the abandoned buildings and littered streets.
	+ Related words: urban blight, urban deterioration, urban rot
html:
giải nghĩa từ "decayed" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Decay (verb): bị hư hỏng, bị phân hủy

    • Example: The food decayed quickly because it was not stored properly.
    • Related words: decompose, rot, spoil, deteriorate

  • Decay (noun): sự hư hỏng, sự phân hủy

    • Example: The decay of the tooth was caused by poor oral hygiene.
    • Related words: decomposition, rot, spoilage, deterioration

  • Radioactive decay (noun): sự phân hủy phóng xạ

    • Example: The radioactive decay of the material was a major concern for the scientists.
    • Related words: nuclear decay, radioactive disintegration, radiation decay

  • Tooth decay (noun): sự hư hỏng răng

    • Example: The dentist warned her about the dangers of tooth decay if she didn't brush her teeth regularly.
    • Related words: cavities, dental caries, tooth rot

  • Urban decay (noun): sự hư hỏng đô thị

    • Example: The city's urban decay was evident in the abandoned buildings and littered streets.
    • Related words: urban blight, urban deterioration, urban rot
